title: What is Holography in the Plane-Wave Limit of AdS/CFT Correspondence ?
abstract: The issue of holographic principle in the PP-wave limit of the AdS/CFT correspondence is discussed, in the hope of clarifying some confusions in the literature. We show that, in the plane-wave limit, the relation between the partition function in the bulk and the gauge-invariant correlation functions on the boundary should be interpreted on the basis of a tunneling picture in the semi-classical approximation which is appropriate for the plane-wave limit. This leads to a natural relation between Euclidean S-matrix in the bulk and the short-distance operator-product expansion of the so-called BMN operators on the boundary.
